description: Anywhere App is a feature-rich E-commerce website designed using Angular, delivering a mobile-responsive and user-friendly shopping experience. The application incorporates Firebase for backend services and Bootstrap for a polished, responsive UI.

points.name: Product Browsing
points.description: Offers an intuitive interface to explore a wide range of products.

points.name: Advanced Filters
points.description: Enables users to filter products by price (low to high or high to low) and categories.

points.name: Responsive Design
points.description: Built with Bootstrap to ensure a seamless experience across devices.

points.name: Shopping Cart
points.description: Includes a cart feature stored in local storage for uninterrupted shopping sessions.

points.name: User Authentication
points.description: Features secure login and registration modules with separate pages for each.

points.name: Firebase Integration
points.description: Utilizes Firebase for scalable backend services, including real-time database and authentication.

points.name: Admin Panel
points.description: Provides administrators with tools to add, edit, or delete products efficiently.

description: MindShare is a Social Media Application built using Angular, offering a dynamic and interactive user experience. The application leverages Firebase for backend services and focuses on seamless engagement and customization for users.

points.name: User Authentication
points.description: Features secure login and registration modules powered by Firebase Authentication.

points.name: Customizable User Profiles
points.description: Allows users to personalize their profiles with ease.

points.name: Photo Upload and Storage
points.description: Integrated Firebase Storage for uploading and storing images.

points.name: Responsive Design
points.description: Built with Angular and Bootstrap for an intuitive and visually appealing interface.

points.name: Real-Time Data Handling
points.description: Utilizes Firebase for APIs and data storage, ensuring fast and reliable interaction.

points.name: Firebase Integration
points.description: Utilizes Firebase for scalable backend services, including real-time database and authentication.
